about_the_game:
Slothtopia is a family-friendly charming life simulator game where you can fish, farm, build relationships, and even catch monsters as an adorable, hard working sloth. Catch fish at sea, come home and pick fresh herbs from the garden, and make a meal for your friends. Build friendships and romance with other villagers. Catch local monsters and train them to help you with tasks around the island. These are just a few of the things to do on the magical island of Slothtopia!





Much like the villagers find refuge and food at sea, they also look to the island's fertile soil for dinner. Farming is an excellent way to connect with nature and provide for friends & family. Spend time sowing, planting, watering, and harvesting your crops





Everyone is welcome in Slothtopia! We want you to feel represented and comfortable. You can fully customize your sloth character with colors, clothes, hairs, gender (pronoun write-in available), name, and more!



The customization options don't stop with your character. Place items around the island and in town square to your liking. Build your home on the island and design it to your heart's content





Catching island monsters can be difficult. Hone your skills by picking magical fruits and hiding in the tall grass until you spot one. Once caught you will be required to provide for your monster. You can pet, feed, and train your monster to level up your relationship and it's abilities. Unlike some other popular monster catching games, we do not battle our monsters. We use them much more like service animals. They are excellent companions, but also serve a distinct purpose. You must train them to utilize their special skills. Once trained, you can send your monster on tasks like catching fish, farming, and even romancing that special someone





Island villagers are your friends and family! They will assign many of the games tasks and help you in completing them. Slothtopia villagers are powered by next-generation artificial intelligence allowing for dynamic and meaningful conversations

Spend time getting to know your new neighbors. Level up friendships with them and even spark up romance! Live a vibrant social life in Slothtopia




Slothtopia is abundant with natural resources. The sea is where the villagers find adventure, fish for the island's monsters, and retrieve dinner for their families. Spend time fishing the island’s lakes but also make sure to venture offshore for tuna and other pelagic ocean fish. Hop aboard your trusted vessel and spend your day on the pristine ocean waters surrounding Slothtopia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 560, AMD Radeon HD 6970
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
